snippet: Pharmaceutical companies are under increasing pressure to release previously hidden data on how well their drugs work.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that pharmaceutical companies are under increasing pressure to release previously hidden data on how well their drugs work; contends controversy surrounding Tamiflu, anti-flu drug produced by Roche pharmaceutical company, exemplifies difficulties of obtaining clinical data about drugs that are vital to public health.
lead_paragraph: Pharmaceutical companies are under increasing pressure to release previously hidden data on how well their drugs work.

headline.main: Full Disclosure Needed for Clinical Drug Data
headline.print_headline: Full Disclosure Needed for Clinical Drug Data
